profilePage.p1: Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy [Link to Privacy Policy], which outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.
profilePage.p2: By continuing to use the 'Brincos Dieras' App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms of Use. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].
profilePage.p3: Thank you for choosing 'Brincos Dieras' to showcase your business ideas!
profilePage.t1: These Terms of Use govern your use of the `Brincos Dieras`mobile application provided by us. By accessing or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the App
profilePage.t2: By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. These terms may be updated or modified, and it is your responsibility to review them periodically
profilePage.h2u1: To use certain features of the App, you may be required to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password.
profilePage.h2u2: You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
profilePage.h3u1: When using the App, you agree not to:
profilePage.h3u2: Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
profilePage.h3u3: Infringe upon the rights of others. Post or share any harmful, abusive, or inappropriate content.
profilePage.h3u4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other users accounts
